mapper.sql: id, code, name, perms, url, method, pid, order_num, type, status, create_time, update_time, deleted
mapper.select: select p.* from sys_permission p left join sys_role_permission rp on (p.id=rp.permission_id) left join sys_role r on (rp.role_id=r.id) left join sys_user_role ur on (r.id=ur.role_id) left join sys_user u on (ur.user_id=u.id) where u.id=#{userId} and u.deleted=1 and p.perms is not null and p.perms<>''
select p.* from sys_permission p where p.deleted=1

select u.id from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on (u.id=ur.user_id) left join sys_role_permission sp on (ur.role_id=sp.role_id) left join sys_permission p on (sp.permission_id=p.id) where p.id = #{id} and p.deleted=1
